Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Apartamentos Ficus - All Inclusive in Teguise (Costa Teguise), you'll be close to Las Cucharas Beach and Costa Teguise Golf Club. This all-inclusive resort is within the vicinity of Cesar Manrique Foundation and Sports City of Lanzarote.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 109 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a nightclub and an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
This resort is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Apartamentos Ficus - All Inclusive. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
This resort is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Apartamentos Ficus - All Inclusive. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Apartamentos Ficus - All Inclusive in Teguise (Costa Teguise), you'll be close to Las Cucharas Beach and Costa Teguise Golf Club. This all-inclusive resort is within the vicinity of Cesar Manrique Foundation and Sports City of Lanzarote.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Las Cucharas Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Costa Teguise Golf Club - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Cesar Manrique Foundation - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Sports City of Lanzarote - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Centro Asociado de la UNED de Lanzarote - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Santa Barbara Castle - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Cactus Garden - 8.6 km / 5.4 mi
Deiland Shopping Center - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi
Pocillos Beach - 16.3 km / 10.1 mi
Rancho Texas Park - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
Lanzarote Golf Resort - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Jameos del Agua - 18.1 km / 11.2 mi
Cueva de los Verdes - 18.1 km / 11.3 mi
Puerto del Carmen Beach - 19.1 km / 11.9 mi
Guinate Animal Park - 21.4 km / 13.3 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Ficus - All Inclusive is Arrecife (ACE-Lanzarote) - 12.9 km / 8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Ficus is Arrecife (ACE-Lanzarote) - 13.1 km / 8.2 mi.
